Question: Shenzhen Zhenghaixin Technology co., ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Zhenghaixin Technology Co., Ltd.

Magnetic Wireless Charger

- Specializes in design, development, and sales of magnetic wireless power bank, charger, game accessories, and battery case
- Complies with international quality standards and certifications including CE, FCC, ROHS, and UL
- Products appreciated in various markets globally
- Factory with 10 years of experience in production
- Located in Shenzhen, Guangdong province, with convenient transportation access
